title: The presidential Inauguration invitation for Ronald Reagan in 1981. Does anyone know the name of this particular script?
author: mirandy

comments.content:
I find differences in this script from any fonts I have located so far. It is a Spencerian style, but the W and f, to mention two letters, do not conform to other scripts in that style, like Palace and Embassy.

- Mike Yanega

Thank you so much for your help! I really appreciate your quick response, as well. I'm trying to finish my report and you've just made it so much easier on me. Thank you, again, and have a great evening. God bless you!

\_Mirandy
